nodes.bodyText: I'm guessing this still works with the // in the path?
It works - but since I need to merge with Jesse's changes, I've removed the extra "/".
Not going to try these tests with the MP JWT features anymore?
Had commented out the extra runs while I was testing with Jesse's changes to the runner - I shouldn't have delivered that file with those updates.  I've re-enabled.
Not entirely sure if this is necessary.

nodes.bodyText: Is this simply printing out the name and number of the tasks being performed?
Yes -it's for debugging the gradle build - I've commented it out (left the code block as it's not an obvious thing to add to debug)
